But <S%G1161><s%> they made light of <S%G272><s%> <S%G5660><s%> it, and went their ways <S%G565><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, one <S%G3303><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G2398><s%> farm <S%G68><s%>, another <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> merchandise <S%G1711><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> when the king <S%G935><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> thereof, he was wroth <S%G3710><s%> <S%G5681><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he sent forth <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5660><s%> his <S%G846><s%> armies <S%G4753><s%>, and destroyed <S%G622><s%> <S%G5656><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> murderers <S%G5406><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> burned up <S%G1714><s%> <S%G5656><s%> their <S%G846><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5679><s%> the P'rushim <S%G5330><s%>, and took <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5627><s%> counsel <S%G4824><s%> how <S%G3704><s%> they might entangle <S%G3802><s%> <S%G5661><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his talk <S%G3056><s%>.

Master <S%G1320><s%>, which <S%G4169><s%> is the great <S%G3173><s%> Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%>?

<S%G1161><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Thou shalt love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5692><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> mind <S%G1271><s%>.
This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> Mitzvah <S%G1785><s%>.

On <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G5025><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> Mitzvot <S%G1785><s%> hang <S%G2910><s%> <S%G5743><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>.
